pages.text: The first room in a Vault is the $(#033dfc)Portal Room$(). This room will allow the Player to return to the Overworld in case they $(#f00)cannot complete$() $(#033dfc)the Vault$().$(br2)$(#033dfc)Vault Rooms$() are the key part of the $(#033dfc)Vaults$(). Each Vault will have a varying amount of rooms which are 47x47x47 Blocks in size, interconnected by $(#033dfc)hallways$().

Vault Rooms contain the Loot in the Vaults, which is usually guarded by special $(#033dfc)Spawners$() that constantly spawn Mobs. Vault Rooms come in different rarities, $(#033dfc)Common$(), $(#033dfc)Rare$(), $(#033dfc)Epic$() and $(#033dfc)Omega$() Rooms, which all contain a varying degree of Loot and Spawners.
